text:
All data for the column 'Specific Factor':

- Record ID 0: Ethical considerations (beliefs about captivity and animal rights)
- Record ID 1: Direct human-animal interaction
- Record ID 2: Inappropriate visitor behavior
- Record ID 3: Disproportionate suffering (suitability of taxa for captivity)
- Record ID 4: Animal behavior (active and natural vs. abnormal or inactive)
- Record ID 5: Apparent health status
- Record ID 6: The facility (zoo purpose and advertisement, facility size)
- Record ID 7: The exhibit (naturalistic enclosure, enclosure size, enrichment, group size, condition of enclosure, diet, sensory stressors, temperature)
- Record ID 8: Welfare interpretation (educational material)
- Record ID 9: Impact of welfare perceptions on visitor experience and behavior
